TextStringDefinition.TextString: Change relationship settings.\n\nThese settings affect the base game mechanics like age restrictions, gender preferences, incest, polygamy, and jealousy).
Changing this setting requires restarting the game to take full effect!\n\nSave and restart for this setting to work.
Check to enable Sims personality archetypes impressions.\nUncheck to disable Sims personality archetype impressions.
Check to allow Sims personality archetypes hint notifications to show up.\nUncheck to disallow Sims personality archetypes hint notifications from showing up.
Check to enable attractiveness affecting Sims.\nUncheck to disable attractiveness affecting Sims.
Check to allow Sims attractiveness to influence relationship interactions.\nUncheck to disallow Sims attractiveness from influencing relationship interactions.
Check to allow storytelling notifications, moodlets, and events related to attractiveness.\nUncheck to disallow storytelling notifications, moodlets, and events related to attractiveness.
Check to unlock romance interactions between teen-age and adult-age Sims.\nUncheck to keep romance interactions locked between teen-age and adult-age Sims.
Check to unlock romance interactions for multiple partners and marriages.\nUncheck to keep romance interactions locked from multiple partners and marriages.

Check to enable Sims remembering boring conversations for a few hours.
Uncheck to keep the base game behavior of boring conversations.

Repeating social interactions leads to boredom, which in the base game is forgotten immediately after the conversation ends.
Change things that you find annoying.
Check to enable Sims gaining desire from romance interactions.\nUncheck to disable Sims gaining desire and desire moodlets.

Check to keep the default jealousy from cheating behavior of Sims.
Uncheck to disable any jealousy from cheating behavior of Sims.

Use the Polyamorous reward trait for individual Sims.

Check to enable incestuous relationships.
Uncheck to disable incestuous relationships.

Use the Incest reward trait for individual Sims.
Bummer, looks like {0.SimFirstName} wasn't being honest and was found faking {M0.his}{F0.her} personality. The relationship is ruined... at least for now.
{0.SimFirstName} has been deceived by a Sim pretending to be someone they're not! You can't trust them anymore, not when they are being dishonest.
{0.SimFirstName} formed a positive impression with another Sim. This should help to shape a good relationship and build more trust.
Show your personality and make a good impression towards a Sim.
Persuasion helps immensely when trying to influence Sims beliefs and behavior against their mind.\n\nStart by trying to impress Sims with your real or fake personality.
{0.SimFirstName}'s new Persuasion skill will help {M0.him}{F0.her} to influence other Sims beliefs and behavior against their mind.

{0.SimFirstName} is now somewhat better at persuading Sims!

{M0.He}{F0.She} is starting to learn about the amazing opportunities that persuasion gives.

Faking personalities should be easier as well!

{0.SimFirstName} is now better at persuading Sims!

{M0.He}{F0.She} understands that most conversations do not require trying to get someone to do or accept something. Aggressive pushers are a turn-off and will put most people on the defensive.

Faking personalities should be easier as well!

{0.SimFirstName} is now much better at persuading Sims!

Truly persuasive Sims understand their power and use it sparingly and knowingly. They are actively listening when in persuasion mode, looking for common ground to help establish a meaningful relationship.

Faking personalities should be easier as well!

{0.SimFirstName} is now very good at persuading Sims!

Influence is power, and {0.SimFirstName} is now the master of influence with {M0.his}{F0.her} persuasion skill.

Faking personalities should be much easier as well!
These Sims are open to having multiple romantic or sexual committed relationships and don't get jealous about their loved ones having more than one partner.
Everyman Sims just want to belong and feel like a part of something. They lack any distinctive identity and rarely stand out.
Jester Sims live for the moments of joy, humor, and silliness. Often, though, they are irresponsible, wasting time by playing around instead of focusing on their goals.
Sage Sims seek wisdom and focus on finding the truth in every situation. However, their knowledge-seeking nature might cause them to think too much and not act enough.
Artist Sims strive to create things of enduring value and achieve their vision. In many cases, however, the fear of not being exceptional prevents their growth.

Hero Sims are eager to demonstrate the courage to prove their worth and confidence. Subsequently, they might end up appearing arrogant by looking for faults in others to feel good about themselves or pick fights.
Caregiver Sims are driven by their empathy and compassion to protect and care. Unfortunately, others can exploit their good nature for their own ends.
Innocent Sims positivity and happiness has a great power to uplift others. But they can appear very childish and their optimistic perspective causes them to be too naive.
Lover Sims crave intimacy, live to experience pleasure, and are very passionate. Nonetheless, with their desire to evoke love in others, they risk losing their own identity and appear shallow.

Greedy Sims focus on generating as much revenue as possible and saving as much capital as possible, no matter the consequences. But their stingy approach to reality makes them appear selfish, envious, and villainous.
Personality Readers need just a few words to determine the personality of another Sim.
Sims with Unique Appearance never blend in with the crowd, no matter how average they look.

{0.SimName} shows signs of the {1.String} personality archetype. Talk about topic related to the {1.String} personality to make a positive impression. {2.String} Looks like this Sim has only one personality archetype.

{0.SimName} shows signs of the {1.String} personality archetype. Talk about topic related to the {1.String} personality to make a positive impression. {2.String} It seems like this Sim has one more personality archetype to discover. Knowing both Sim personality archetypes is the key to making a positive impression.

{0.SimName} shows signs of the {1.String} personality archetype. Talk about topic related to the {1.String} personality to make a positive impression. {2.String} Looks like this Sim has only one personality archetype. Select the {1.String} personality archetype in the Personality Pie Menu to fake it.

{0.SimName} shows signs of the {1.String} personality archetype. Talk about topic related to the {1.String} personality to make a positive impression. {2.String} It seems like this Sim has one more personality archetype to discover. Knowing both Sim personality archetypes is the key to making a positive impression. Select the {1.String} personality archetype in the Personality Pie Menu to fake it.

{0.SimName} is now faking the {2.String} personality archetype.
Social interactions specific to this personality are now available in the Friendly Pie Menu.

{3.String}

Be careful, faking a personality archetype that is not compatible with {1.SimName} risks appearing as a poser.

{0.SimName} is now faking {M0.his}{F0.her} personality towards {1.SimName}.

While talking with {1.SimName}, certain topics that are related to {M1.his}{F1.her} personality will show hints that help to determine it.
Make sure to first learn {1.SimName} personality before trying to fake it.

To make a positive impression, a compatible personality has to be selected from the Personality Pie Menu.
Bummer, looks like {0.SimFirstName} wasn't being honest and {1.SimFirstName} realized that {M0.he}{F0.she} was faking {M0.his}{F0.her} personality. The relationship is ruined... at least for now.
Looks like {0.SimName} formed a positive impression towards {1.SimName}. This should help to shape a good relationship and build more trust.
Oof! {1.SimName} seems to be very unimpressed with {0.SimName} behavior and personality. This makes shaping their relationship harder and hinders the trust between them.

There are ugly Sims and then there are utterly repulsive Sims. Unfortunately, {0.SimFirstName}'s eyes were bombarded by the sight of a Sim that they find particularly abhorrent. It would be best to look away, otherwise {0.SimFirstName} might end up feeling truly ill.

{0.SimFirstName}'s eyes were caressed by a truly magnificent sight as a particularly appealing Sim just entered {M0.his}{F0.her} view. This fine specimen of a Sim now has {0.SimFirstName}'s undivided attention as they try to pick their jaw up from the floor. There are heartpounding moments but this one here is HEARTSTOPPING!
{0.SimFirstName}'s mind is rushed with memories of a certain Sim in particular. All the qualities that brought joy to {M0.his}{F0.her} eyes have made it a hard task to think about anything else.

{0.SimFirstName} suddenly finds {M0.himself}{F0.herself} craving a certain someone, their beloved Spouse. {M0.He}{F0.She} hit the jackpot in the field of love, there isn't anyone who suits {M0.his}{F0.her} desires more than their loving partner in life. Just thinking of them has {0.SimFirstName} yearning for their presence. A burning desire to hold and to love this Sim that has captured {M0.his}{F0.her} heart.

Wow, what a Sim! {0.SimName} just stopped what they were thinking about for a moment and found themselves staring at {1.SimName}. That {M1.man}{F1.woman} has so many of the qualities that make {0.SimFirstName}'s heart race, as if it were on a cross country marathon. Their {M1.handsome}{F1.beautiful} features meet {0.SimFirstName}'s desires so readily that it's almost as if whatever created such a Sim sculpted {M1.him}{F1.her} specifically for them.\n\nNow the only thing left is to pick up their jaw and work up the courage to speak to such an {M1.Adonis}{F1.Aphrodite}. Hopefully, {1.SimFirstName} will be kind enough to reciprocate {0.SimFirstName}'s feelings.

{0.SimFirstName}'s head remembers {1.SimName} fondly as memories of {M1.him}{F1.her} begin to populate their mind. The task at hand is just an afterthought as qualities of {1.SimFirstName} manifest themselves as strong echoes that bring {0.SimFirstName} intense amounts of joy. Their encounter last time was too brief and now {0.SimFirstName} is thirsty for more. When the chance to meet with {1.SimFirstName} arrives, it will not have come soon enough.\n\nSims like these should be cherished, there aren't that many of them out there and it was a stroke of good luck or even a miracle that allowed {0.SimFirstName} to meet one that ticked off so many of {M0.his}{F0.her} wishes and desires.

{0.SimFirstName}'s dreams bring {M0.him}{F0.her} to a state of nirvana as they recollect their cherished moments with {1.SimName}. It's almost surreal, this ravishing creature that stalks {M0.him}{F0.her} as {M0.he}{F0.she} slumbers. How could someone so perfect for them actually exist?\n\nThough still unsure there is one proof that soon sheds light to the truth for {0.SimFirstName}, the manifestation of {1.SimFirstName} that {M1.strides confidently}{F1.dances gracefully} within {M0.his}{F0.her} mind is still but a pale comparison to the true thing. The happiness from seeing and even touching the corporeal {1.SimName} dwarfs the joy that this dream can ever provide.

They say lightning never strikes the same place twice. Well tell that to {0.SimFirstName}, {M0.he}{F0.she} found the Sim of {M0.his}{F0.her} dreams and by some miracle, got to marry {M1.him}{F1.her} too.\n\nThere are times like this when {0.SimFirstName} likes to remind {M0.himself}{F0.herself} just how lucky they are to be married to a ravishing {M1.hunk}{F1.goddess} like {1.SimName}. To be able to love and be loved by such a captivating creature brings incomprehensible joy to {M0.his}{F0.her} heart and the attraction they have for their beloved partner still endures like an undying blaze even now.

It's dreams like this that {0.SimFirstName} never wants to wake up from. In it there is but one focal point, one element that pervades all thoughts within {M0.his}{F0.her} mind and that is {1.SimName}.

Such a wondrous manifestation has {0.SimFirstName} utterly enthralled as {M0.he}{F0.she} abandons all other thoughts in order to contemplate {1.SimFirstName}'s every feature, every contour and nuance of {M1.his}{F1.her} body and every discernible detail that makes this breathtaking Sim unique. {0.SimFirstName} absolutely cherishes those factors and as the dream continues, they become more and more enraptured by this Sim that has stolen both {M0.his}{F0.her} mind and {M0.his}{F0.her} heart.

In the end, there is only one reason as to why they'd consider waking up, and that is the real {1.SimName} waiting for them on the other side.
After asking {1.SimName}, {0.SimFirstName} found them to be very forthcoming. According to them, they like Sims that have:\n

Well, that could have gone better. It sounds like {1.SimName} didn't appreciate {0.SimFirstName} asking for {M1.his}{F1.her} preferences. Though none of their likes were revealed, it wasn't a complete loss. {1.SimFirstName} briefly mentioned to {0.SimFirstName} that they have a strong disliking towards:\n

Following a few brief moments of silence, {1.SimName} expressed that {M1.he}{F1.she} doesn't have any noteworthy things to say that would satisfy {0.SimFirstName}. Perhaps {0.SimFirstName} is already attractive enough in the eyes of {1.SimFirstName}.
After asking {1.SimName}, {0.SimFirstName} found them to be unsurprisingly vocal about their particular aversions towards others. According to them, they dislike Sims that have:\n

Oops, that didn't go so well. It seems that {1.SimName} didn't appreciate {0.SimFirstName} asking for {M1.his}{F1.her} preferences. Even though this made things slightly awkward, {1.SimFirstName} in her flustered state briefly mentioned strongly disliking:\n
Following a few brief moments of silence, {1.SimName} expressed that {M1.he}{F1.she} doesn't have any noteworthy things to say. It could be that {M1.he}{F1.she} isn't so picky as some other Sims.
{1.SimName} considers {0.SimFirstName}'s question for a moment, and then agrees to tell {M0.him}{F0.her} about the preferences of {2.SimName}. According to them {2.SimFirstName} likes:\n
After thinking about it for a moment {1.SimName} agreed to tell {0.SimFirstName} about features that {2.SimName} dislikes. From what {M1.he}{F1.she} understands, {2.SimFirstName} dislikes:\n
Well, that wasn't very useful at all. After asking {1.SimName} about {2.SimName} it was found that {M1.he}{F1.she} doesn't really know anything about {2.SimFirstName}'s preferences.
I'm not telling you anything about {2.SimName}.
After {0.SimFirstName} finished scoping the room for attractive faces, {M0.he}{F0.she} noticed one that sparked {M0.his}{F0.her} interest.\n\nSpot pulsating hearts to recognize attraction.
After {0.SimFirstName} finished scoping the room for attractive faces, {M0.he}{F0.she} noticed a few that sparked {M0.his}{F0.her} interest.\n\nSpot pulsating hearts to recognize attraction.
After {0.SimFirstName} finished scoping the room for attractive faces, {M0.he}{F0.she} hasn't noticed anybody interesting.

All of the attractiveness preferences are generated based on the Sim romantic partners attractive traits.\n\n(Requires existing romantic partners.)
All of the attractiveness preferences are generated based on the Sim parents attractive traits.\n\n(Requires existing family parents.)

All of the attractiveness preferences are generated based on the Sim own attractive traits.
Based on most common Attractive Traits
All of the attractiveness preferences are generated based on the most common attractive traits of all Sims in the world.
All of the attractiveness preferences are random.

You're about to generate Attractiveness Preferences for the selected Sims based on the romantic partners (official or affairs) of each individual selected Sim.
Elements like sex, gender, occult, voice, body shape, hair, facial hair, eye color, skin details, and clothing are considered when generating new Attractiveness Preferences.

This action will override any existing Attractiveness Preferences of the selected Sims.
